443720.name: Europa Universalis IV: Sounds from the community - Kairi Soundtrack Part II
443720.description:
Europa Universalis IV – Sounds from the Community – Kairi Soundtrack II


Add new variety and inspiration to your Europa Universalis IV experience with the second soundtrack composed by the avid Europa Universalis fan Kairi!
Invoke themes and sounds of history with music inspired by the regions of the Far east, from the grasslands of the Khanate to the shores of the South Seas of Asia.

Kairi Sawler, the talented creator of a prior community soundtrack grasps the emotion and traditions of the Far East
to make this pack the perfect backdrop to the march of your growing dynasty.

The following songs are included:

  • 1 - Peace for Generations
  • 2 - The Grasslands Call
  • 3 - The Great Wall
  • 4 - Eastern Fronts
  • 5 - Temple Ambitions
443720.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
